Posts.Content: Oct 2, 2016 12:40AM sabrinaA wrote: Melissa, I've posted this on here because I thought it'd be the best to ask about it. And also because I saw this topic that I posted it in. It is in fac called "Benign Breast Conditions" with the description: "A safe place to worry for members who have not been diagnosed with breast cancer, but have concerns about their breasts."
Posts.Title: Breast pain and swelling sabrinaA pari143

Posts.Content: sabrinaA wrote: I didn't realize or think anything of it but ever since my period started on September 15th, my breasts have been really tender. Only just a few months ago I started getting this pms symptom, I normally don't have any symptoms. I'm worried because they are still tender and heavy and a little bigger than normal. I've seen things about hormonal imbalance (for instance: high estrogen levels) but I don't think I have enough symptoms for it to be that. Although I do have quite irregular periods. I thought maybe it was my bra so I switched it but it just seems to have gotten worse. I'm not too worried that it's breast cancer because there are no lumps or any other breast cancer symptoms but I thought this was the best place to ask why this tenderness isn't going away. And if I should just see a doctor about it or if it's something that doesn't require me to. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Breast pain and swelling sabrinaA pari143
